original_text: All these things that I have said will certainly happen. When my people see them happen, they will know that a prophet has lived among them.’
korean_text: 그 말이 응하리니 응할 때에는 그들이 한 선지자가 자기 가운데에 있었음을 알리라

sentences.original_text: All these things that I have said
When my people see them happen,
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성들이 그것들이 일어나는 것을 볼 때,

sentences.original_text: that a prophet has lived among them.'
